data.title: Pair Connect
data.description: A platform designed and developed as a team to connect developers for collaborative programming sessions based on skills and preferences. I am responsible for the **frontend development**, ensuring a **modern, responsive, and user-friendly** experience. This project started during the bootcamp, and we **continue working on it as a team**, holding regular **Scrum meetings**. Currently, we are in the **redesign phase in Figma**, refining the **UI/UX** before further implementation.

data.title: Marvel & DC
data.description: This is my **individual bootcamp project**, which I **continue developing**. I am responsible for the **design, frontend, and backend**, handling every aspect of the platform. It allows users to explore popular **Marvel and DC characters** and teams, featuring **advanced character search** and full **CRUD functionality** for managing them.

data.title: Dermatech
data.description: **Hack Barna: My First In-Person Hackathon.** With just **two months of programming experience**, I joined **Hack Barna** alongside my **bootcamp teammate** and a **backend developer**. However, after showing up on the first day, he **left the team without contributing anything** and never returned. Despite this setback, my teammate and I **built and delivered a fully functional project locally**, handling everything **without a backend**. We implemented an **attractive design** and a **chatbot integrated with OpenAI’s API**, all in just **24 hours**. It was a true test of **resilience, teamwork, and rapid learning**.

data.title: Sequiatron
data.description: Project developed as a **team** during a **2-day online hackathon**. I was responsible for the **design and development** of the **contact form**, **navbar**, **team page**, and the creation of the **logo**. Despite the **limited time**, we managed to build a **functional, accessible, and well-structured** interface for a **smooth user experience**.

data.title: Boored
data.description: Web application developed as a **technical challenge** to qualify for the **Saló Ocupació Hackathon**, which I **successfully passed**. I built this project in just **1 day**, implementing the given **design from a PDF mockup** and ensuring a **fully responsive layout**. As an extra, I added **light and dark mode support** to enhance the **user experience**. This **quick development process** allowed me to refine my **front-end skills** and led to my participation in the next hackathon project, **Barris Vius**.

data.title: Barris Vius
data.description: Project developed in a **team of frontend, backend, and data science** during the **Saló de l'Ocupació Hackathon** at the **IT Academy** in **Barcelona**. I worked on the **frontend** and **UI design**, ensuring a **responsive layout** and structuring the application for **future data integration**. In a **short time**, we built a **functional prototype** that showcased the platform’s **potential**.

data.title: La Caixa The Game is On
data.description: Project developed during the **'The Game is HackathOn - React Frontend Challenge'** by **CaixaBank**. The goal was to build a **personal finance assistant**, implementing features like **transaction management (CRUD)**, **budget tracking**, **state management**, **data visualization**, and **authentication** using **React** and **Material UI**.

data.title: La Caixa Coding Challenges
data.description: Developed during a **second NUWE Hackathon** with **CaixaBank**, where I worked on the **frontend logic** of a **financial web app** based on a **pre-designed UI**. Both challenges required **efficient problem-solving** and delivering a **functional, scalable UI** under **time constraints**.

data.title: Travel Buddy
data.description: Is a **travel planning app** that offers **destination recommendations** to **registered users**. It was developed in **two weeks** during the **bootcamp**, where I **led the team** and worked on both **frontend** and **backend**. I focused on the **design and implementation** of the **Home** and **Welcome pages**, and I was also responsible for **connecting the frontend with the backend**, handling **API requests**, **data fetching**, and **authentication**. While the project is not yet **fully completed**, it showcases **solid fullstack development**.

data.title: Covid Tracker
data.description: Team project where we worked with a **pre-designed user interface** to replicate and an **API (disease.sh)** to dynamically fetch **COVID-19 data**. My contributions focused on implementing the **navigation bar in the Tracker** and developing the **'Tracker 4' page**, integrating **API data** while following **best practices** to create an **intuitive and informative tracker**.

data.title: Piedra, papel o tijera
data.description: Design & Development. Only mobile and tablet. More details coming soon.
